gate.relations
Interface Relation

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
SimpleRelation
public interface Relation
extends Serializable

Interface representing a relation between GATE annotations.

          Relation type for co-reference relations.

Method Detail

getType

String getType()
Get the type of the relation (e.g. COREF).

Returns:
the relation type.

getMembers

int[] getMembers()
Gets the members of the relation.

Returns:
an array containing annotation IDs.

getUserData

Serializable getUserData()
Some relations may have associated arbitrary data; this method can be used to retrieve it.

Returns:
the user data that was previously added to this relation.

setUserData

void setUserData(Serializable data)
Associates some arbitrary user data to this relation.

Parameters:
data - the user data value.
